results.title: Beyond the Headlines: Decoding Bias with FIB Framework
results.summary: HonestReporting introduces the FIB (Falsehood Identification & Breakdown) Framework to combat media bias against Israel. The framework identifies five core narrative distortions: Delegitimizing Sovereignty, Justifying Violence, Denying Violence, Shifting Blame, and Fabricating Facts. "Media bias today is more complex... than ever." The article highlights the use of AI via BiasBreaker to detect and respond to false narratives, holding media accountable and restoring truth.

results.title: Observations from Montreal: July 20, 2025
results.summary: A collection of commentaries on Montreal politics and culture highlights issues such as housing crises, energy independence, cultural preservation, and political criticism. Key quotes include: 'Stop enabling housing crises...' and 'The fun city of art and artists I once knew has been sold off to speculators and influencers.' The article does not align with biblical axioms, focusing on secular political and social issues without reference to God or scripture.

results.title: Gabbard Claims Obama Admin Manufactured 2016 Russian Interference Narrative
results.summary: Tulsi Gabbard, Director of National Intelligence, released a report claiming the Obama administration manipulated intelligence regarding Russian interference in the 2016 election. The report alleges a "treasonous conspiracy" involving figures like James Clapper, John Brennan, and James Comey. Reactions vary along political lines, with Republicans supporting Gabbard's claims and Democrats dismissing them as false. "The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?" (Jeremiah 17:9). Consider all sources, and pray for discernment.
